name: Snooker 19
description: Snooker 19 - The official videogame of World Snooker.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3-4130T Dual-Core (3M Cache, 2.9GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX GPU 2GB GDDR5 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-4460  3.20GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
